dataDir.description: Path to directory to store files and repository clones.

dryRun.description: Toggle dry-run mode. No pull requests will be created or merged when enabled.

gitAuthor.description: Author to use for git commits. Global git configuration applies if not set. Must conform to RFC5322: `User Name <user@name.local>`.

gitCloneOptions.description: Command-line options to pass to `git clone`.

gitCommitMessage.description: Default commit message to use if a task does not define a custom one.

gitLogLevel.description: Level for logs sent by the git sub-system. These logs can be very verbose and can make it tricky to find logs of other sub-systems.

gitPath.description: Path to `git` executable. PATH will be searched if not set.

githubAddress.description: Address of GitHub server to use.

githubCacheDisabled.description: If true, disables caching of HTTP responses received from the GitHub API.

githubToken.description: Token to use for authentication at the GitHub API.

gitlabAddress.description: Address of GitLab server to use.

gitlabToken.description: Token to use for authentication at the GitLab API.

javaPath.description: Path to the Java binary to execute plugins. If not set explicitly, then saturn-bot searches for the binary in $PATH.

pythonPath.description: Path to the Python binary to execute plugins. If not set explicitly, then saturn-bot searches for the binary in $PATH.

serverAccessLog.description: Turn access log of server on or off.

serverBaseUrl.description: URL of the API server. The value is used to populate the `servers` array in the OpenAPI definition.

serverCompress.description: Turn compression of responses on or off.

serverDatabasePath.description: Path to the sqlite database of the server. If unset, defaults to `{{dataDir}}/db/saturn-bot.db`.

serverDatabaseLog.description: If `true`, display executed SQL queries and errors of the database. Useful for debugging.

workerLoopInterval.description: Interval at which a worker queries the server for new tasks to run.

workerParallelExecutions.description: Number of parallel executions of tasks per worker.

workerServerAPIBaseURL.description: Base URL of the server API to query for new tasks to execute.
